alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Bighorn Canyon; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Big Horn; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 7:50AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A QUICK SHOT OF SNOW THIS MORNING... An area of light to locally moderate snowfall will move acros the area this morning. Accumulations will generally be less than an inch, though a bit more is possible in the higher foothills including Bozeman Pass. Expect changeable road conditions, poor visibility at times, and slick spots through 10am. Locations impacted include... Billings, Sheridan, Livingston, Hardin, Red Lodge, Columbus, Big Timber, Laurel, Ranchester, Dayton, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Lodge Grass, Clyde Park, Pryor, Granite Pass, Lockwood, Gardiner and Fort Smith. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
